import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; const CertificateTemplatePage = () => { const [certificateData, setCertificateData] = useState({ name: "Alexandra Mitchell", event: "Advanced Web Development Workshop", type: "Excellence", organizer: "Tech Education Institute", date: new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }), certificateId: `CERT-${Date.now().toString(36).toUpperCase()}-${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000).toString().padStart(3, '0')}`, issuedOn: "November 15, 2024", validUntil: "November 15, 2026" }); const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false); const handleCopyId = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(certificateData.certificateId); setCopied(true); setTimeout(() => setCopied(false), 2000); }; const handleDownload = () => { const element = document.getElementById('certificate-print'); // In a real app, you would use html2canvas or similar library console.log('Downloading certificate...'); }; const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; const qrData = `https://verify.certificate.org/${certificateData.certificateId}`; return (
{/* Header */}

Certificate of Achievement

Digitally signed and verified

Certificate ID: {certificateData.certificateId}
{/* Left Panel - Certificate Preview */}
{/* Certificate Border */}
{/* Certificate Header */}
üèÜ
Excellence Awards

CERTIFICATE OF ACHIEVEMENT

This certificate is proudly presented to

{/* Recipient Name */}

{certificateData.name}

{/* Achievement Details */}

For outstanding performance and exceptional dedication in

{certificateData.event}

demonstrating excellence in skills and knowledge acquisition

{/* Award Badge */}
{certificateData.type} Award
{/* Details Grid */}
Issued By {certificateData.organizer}
Date Issued {certificateData.date}
Certificate ID {certificateData.certificateId}
Valid Until {certificateData.validUntil}
{/* Signature and QR Area */}

Dr. Samantha Rodriguez

Director of Education

Scan to Verify ID: {certificateData.certificateId.slice(-8)}
{/* Official Seal */}
OFFICIAL 2024
{/* Action Buttons */}
{/* Right Panel - Certificate Details */}

Certificate Details

Recipient {certificateData.name}
Event {certificateData.event}
Award Type {certificateData.type}
Issuing Organization {certificateData.organizer}
Issue Date {certificateData.date}
Valid Until {certificateData.validUntil}
Certificate ID {certificateData.certificateId}

Verification

This certificate is digitally signed and can be verified using the QR code or Certificate ID.

Scan to verify authenticity

Valid ‚Ä¢ Digitally Signed

This certificate was issued on {certificateData.date} and is valid until {certificateData.validUntil}.
